events.comment: Touch and keyboard commands for the moment

event-group.title: Adjusting Speed based on player input

sub-events.comment: The first value is the type of road, the second value is the number of tiles in that section of road. Does not include hazard calls.

event-group.description: Not the one you're racing against
event-group.title: ScrollingCar
Move car from bottom to top or top to bottom (if not on grass)

sub-events.comment: Testing making the car disappear during grass

event-group.title: stops the car from going on the grass

sub-events.comment: Checks if the car is going to turn. Only displays if there is a regular road.
